about_the_game:
◆Story


I became the mayor after my father passed away. As the unlikable ‘Magic Trash,’ I used high-level props and awakened the magic circle! Unexpectedly, a frightened girl in her tattered clothes—Liz had appeared... No way, no! Did my guardian beast just get blocked by a girl like that?

As a demon under my control, Liz always looked arrogant as she kept competing against me. There must be one who wins and one who loses, even if it is by doing naughty things. But sometimes... she would also smile gently and speak of her loneliness, just like... the harshness was her defense so that no one could enter her heart.

As the thorns enveloping her sprouted new shoots, the city became more and more prosperous, but strange things also emerged bit by bit. The [Withering Flower] curse was gnawing her soul and somehow also affected me!



The Prophet’s warning suddenly echoed in my ears...

「At the end of the flames, that white-haired girl stood, with a blood-stained magic sword in her hands, and...」
「In that hell, you stood by her side.」

If the cruel ending was destined already, would there be any point in struggling?

Control of fate, is it destiny, or is it people’s choice?

◆Gameplay instructions


Player will act as the young mayor in a Western fantasy world, in a city full of various ethnic groups—Noah City. Develop feelings with Liz and discover the hidden truth.

Political affairs can be resolved every five in-game days. Political affairs will affect the country’s value. Choose 【Castle】to train in the Castle. Choose【Town】to go to【Plaza】and take on missions to solve the citizens’ problems. Go to the suburbs for 【Adventure】 to find the required materials for missions and dishes. You may also get a chance to trigger an episode with Liz...?

If you want to develop feelings for Liz, you can use 【Chat】 to know her better, or choose 【Ｈ】 and get some magic through naughty acts. Touching different parts of Liz’s body on the main page will trigger different reactions.

Every choice that the Player makes will decide their path toward the ending.

◆Game features


◇ 28 Basic CG, including 280 differentials and 7 motion CGs
◇ Simulation and management game
◇ 1 Main Female Char, 1 Supporting Female Char
◇ Game Ending: 9 Types

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, Violence, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: I became the mayor after my father passed away. I summoned the guardian beast to strengthen the people’s desires. Unexpectedly, the one I summoned was just a Silver-Haired Girl named Liz! She came along with the prophecies of curses and city destruction. What is the curse? Will Noah City head toward its destruction?
supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, Russian, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
